about_the_game:
An erotic VISUAL NOVEL featuring HD graphics, and realistic-looking characters.
Always the insatiable one, Cristina takes advantage of a steamy shower encounter to seduce her own son, revealing her deepest desires and pushing the boundaries of their forbidden attraction.

GAME DESCRIPTION

EPISODE 3
 

A chance encounter with his stepsister leaves Mike suspicious of Annie's unusually close relationship with her father. The way she parades around naked in front of him, the lingering glances, the shameless flirting—everything points to an affair.

Unsettled, Mike steps into the bathroom to clear his head, only to find his mother, Cristina, indulging in a steamy shower. Unable to keep his thoughts to himself, he confesses his suspicions to her, hoping for some answers.

But the conversation takes an unexpected turn when Cristina not only admits to knowing about the incestuous affair but also confesses to having indulged in the forbidden herself. As secrets unravel and the tension between mother and son intensifies, Mike finds himself naked under the spray with her, pushed toward a line he never thought he'd cross.

Will Mike resist his mother’s charms or will he indulge in the forbidden fruit?

Dive into this steamy family drama and discover how their story unfolds!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game is intended for adults and includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. 
The characters, story, and actions are fictitious. 
Contains nudity, alternative lifestyles, graphic depictions  of oral, vaginal, anal, masturbation and non-penetrative sexual acts, bodily fluids.

This game contains themes of corruption, lesbian sex and incest.
All characters shown in the game are over 18 years old and all sexual acts are consensual.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
